transArray.content: The environment of the hotel is very good, the decoration style is good, but the windows and the area are too small. But in such a clean hotel, there was a cockroach in the bathrobe, and then I changed a room. On the upper floor, I changed the same room. As a result, the mobile phone holder inside was still broken, just blocking the electric curtain , Later, I had to put the bracket on the side to survive
